thread.title: Maharashtra Zilla Parishad and Panchayat Samiti Elections 2017 Results LIVE Updates
thread.title_full: Maharashtra Zilla Parishad and Panchayat Samiti Elections 2017 Results LIVE Updates

title: Maharashtra Zilla Parishad and Panchayat Samiti Elections 2017 Results LIVE Updates
text:
Maharashtra Zilla Parishad and Panchayat Samiti Elections 2017 Results LIVE Updates By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Thursday, February 23, 2017 - 14:38 0 
Also Read: Maharashtra Civic Results 2017 LIVE Updates 
Here are the LIVE Updates :- 
-In Raigad Zilla Parishad, Aditi Tatkare, daughter of NCP state President Sunil Tatkare emerges victorious with 8858 votes. 
-In Sangli Zilla Parishad, NCP is leading in 8 seats, Congress in 4, BJP in 10, Shiv Sena in 10, Vikas Aghadi in 2 seats and independent leading in 2 seats. 
-In Buldhan Zilla Parishad, MP Prataprao Jadhav's son Rushikesh loses in Panchayat Samiti elections. 
Zilla Parisshad /Panchayat Samiti Election Results 2017: Partywise tally as of now 
BJP - 126/119 
According to Maharashtra state BJP spokesperson Keshav Upadhye. ZP/PS Partywise so far. 
— keshav upadhye (@keshavupadhye) February 23, 2017 
-In Nanded Zilla Parishad, Congress is ahead in 14 seats, BJP in 7, Shiv Sena in 6, NCP in 8 and independent in 1 seats. 
-BJP state president Raosaheb Danve’s daughter wins in Jalna Zilla Parishad. 
-In Parbhani, NCP leads ahead in 10 seats, Shiv Sena in 5, BJP 2, Congress 3 and independents in 1 seats. 
-Congress loses in Latur. BJP emerges victorious in 16 out of 18 seats of Latur. 
-In Kolhapur Zilla Parishad, BJP is leading in 4 seats, Shiv Sena is leading in 6, Congress is leading in 10, NCP is leading in 6, Swabhimani Sanghatna is leading in 2, Jansurajya Paksha in 2 and other independent candidates are leading in two seats. 
-In Raigad Zilla Parishad, Shiv Sena ahead in 10, NCP leading in 5; Shetkari Paksha leads in 7, BJP leads in 3 and Congress leads in 1 seats. 
-In Latur Zilla Parishad, BJP leads in 32 seats, Congress leads in 18 and NCP in 4 seats. 
-As per the latest results, Congress has won 12 seats in Nanded Zilla Parishad. 
-In Ratnagiri Zilla Parishad, Shiv Sena emerges victorious at 22 seats. The party wins all 7 seats in Sangameshwar, all 10 seats in Ratnagiri, all 4 seats in Lanja and 1 seats each in Khed and Dapoli. 
-In Sindhudurg Zilla Parishad, Congress leads in 8 seats. 
-In Kolhapur Zilla Parishad, Rahul Aawade of Congress emerges victorious. 
-Son of Shiv Sena MP Hemant Ghodse loses from Nasik Zilla Parishad. 
-In Parbhani Zilla Parishad, NCP gains 6 seats, Shiv Sena wins 3, BJP, Congress and independent candidates win 1 seats each. 
-NCP gains majority in Ambajogai Panchayat Samiti. Out of 12 seats, NCP grabs 7 seats in Ambajogai. 
-NCP gains majority in Ambajogai Panchayat Samiti. Out of 12 seats, NCP grabs 7 seats in Ambajogai. 
In Latur, BJP leads in 15 seats, Congress in 13 and MNS leads in 1 seat. The total number of seats in Latur is 58. 
-In Sangli, son of State Minister Sadabhau Khot loses. 
-In Usmanabad, NCP is leading in 11, Congress in 10, Shiv Sena in 5 and BJP in 3 seats. 
Maharashtra Civic Results 2017 LIVE: Shiv Sena maintains grip on Mumbai, BJP dominates other cities 
Maharashtra Zilla Parishads and Panchayat Samiti Elections – Quick Facts 
Out of the 25 Zilla Parishads, 11 Zilla Parishad voted on February 16 and the rest Zilla Parishads voted on February 21. 
In phase 1, a total of 855 seats were in play for Zilla Parishad polls and 1,712 seats were covered in the Panchayat Samitis poll whereas, in phase 2, a total of 191 Zilla Parishads and 382 Panchayat Samitis which included seats in Kolhapur, Sangli and Satara districts of South Maharashtra went to poll. 
25 Zilla Parishads 
The 25 Zilla Parishad that went to polls are:- Raigad Zilla Parishad, Ratnagiri Zilla Parishad, Sindhudurg Zilla Parishad, Pune Zilla Parishad, Kolhapur Zilla Parishad, Sangli Zilla Parishad, Satara Zilla Parishad, Kolhapur Zilla Parishad, Jalgaon Zilla Parishad, Nashik Zilla Parishad, Ahmednagar Zilla Parishad, Amravati Zilla Parishad, Vardha Zilla Parishad, Gadchiroli Zilla Parishad, Yawatmal Zilla Parishad, Buldhana Zilla Parishad, Pandharpur Zilla Parishad, Aurangabad Zilla Parishad, Hingoli Zilla Parishad,Parbhani Zilla Parishad, Usmanabad Zilla Parishad, Nanded Zilla Parishad, Latur Zilla Parishad, Jalna Zilla Parishad and Beed Zilla Parishad. 
The Zilla Parishad and Maharashtra Zilla Parishads and Panchayat Samiti Elections 2017 results: Counting underway, Congress wins 12 seats in Nanded Maharashtra Zilla Parishads and Panchayat Samiti Elections 2017 results: Counting underway, Congress wins 12 seats in Nanded across Maharashtra state was held in two phases. Phase 1 was conducted on February 16 for a total of 855 seats for the Zilla Parishad while the Panchayat Samiti polls covered 1,712 seats on the same day. 
The phase 2 of Maharashtra Zilla Parishad and Panchayat Samiti Elections were held on February 21 in which a total 191 Zilla Parishad seats and 382 panchayat Samiti seats in Kolhapur, Sangli and Satara districts of South Maharashtra went to the poll. 
Key political players 
The key parties contesting in the state include _ BJP, Shiv Sena, Maharashtra Navnirman Sena, Indian National Congress, Nationalist Congress Party and All India Majlis-e-Ittehad-ul Muslimeen.   13:33 More from zeenews
